Jeyachandran Textiles is a large retail chain, founded in the early 1980s by Mr. Jeyachandran, that offers a wide range of products for men, women, and children, including clothing, accessories, footwear, bags, and even furniture and electronics. Known for its quality, affordability, and customer service, the company has a significant presence with multiple stores in Chennai's T Nagar, Tambaram, and Pallikaranai, as well as an online presence
